mapper.select: SELECT a.nickName,b.*,ci.FEEDBACK,ci.INTERVIEW_ID,ci.INTERVIEW_DATE,dept.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME FROM t_user a JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_candidate b on ci.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept dept on dept.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = ci.CSSUBDEPT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and (ci.FEEDBACK='' or ci.FEEDBACK is null) ORDER BY ci.INTERVIEW_DATE LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT a.nickName,b.*,ci.FEEDBACK,ci.INTERVIEW_ID,ci.INTERVIEW_DATE,dept.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME FROM t_user a JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON (ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID or ci.INTERVIEWER_ID != a.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN t_candidate b on ci.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept dept on dept.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = ci.CSSUBDEPT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and (ci.FEEDBACK='' or ci.FEEDBACK is null) ORDER BY ci.INTERVIEW_DATE LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};
mapper.update: update t_candidate_interview set FEEDBACK = #{interviewFeedBack}, INTERVIEW_STATUS = #{candidateStatus} WHERE INTERVIEW_ID = #{interviewId};
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.NICKNAME FROM t_candidate a left join t_user b on a.LOCK_PERSION = b.USER_ID WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (4,5,6)
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,EXPERIENCE_YEARS desc,EDUCATION,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate a left join t_user b on a.LOCK_PERSION = b.USER_ID WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (4,5,6)
;
SELECT count(0) FROM t_user a LEFT JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and (ci.FEEDBACK='' or ci.FEEDBACK is null);

SELECT count(0) FROM t_user a LEFT JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON (ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID or ci.INTERVIEWER_ID != a.USER_ID) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and (ci.FEEDBACK='' or ci.FEEDBACK is null);
SELECT RESUME_PATH FROM t_candidate WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};

SELECT ${exportDataColumn} FROM t_candidate a left join t_user b on a.LOCK_PERSION = b.USER_ID left join t_user c on a.CREATE_USER = c.USER_ID WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (4,5,6)
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,EXPERIENCE_YEARS desc,EDUCATION,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID;

SELECT a.*,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME FROM t_candidate a LEFT JOIN (select * from (select CANDIDATE_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_ID from t_candidate_push a where PUSH_DATE = (select max(PUSH_DATE) from t_candidate_push b where a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID ) )a group by CANDIDATE_ID )b ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept c ON b.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = c.CS_SUBDEPT_ID WHERE LOCK_PERSION = if(#{lockPerson}='all',a.LOCK_PERSION,#{lockPerson}) and a.LOCK_PERSION is not null and a.LOCK_PERSION != '' and CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (3,4,5,6)
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,INTERVIEW_STATUS,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate a WHERE LOCK_PERSION = if(#{lockPerson}='all',a.LOCK_PERSION,#{lockPerson}) and a.LOCK_PERSION is not null and a.LOCK_PERSION != '' and CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (3,4,5,6)
;
SELECT CS_SUBDEPT_ID as csSubDeptId, CS_SUBDEPT_NAME as csSubDeptName FROM t_cs_dept a group by CS_SUBDEPT_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_NAME ORDER BY CS_SUBDEPT_NAME;
SELECT * FROM t_candidate a WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
mapper.update: update t_candidate set INTERVIEW_STATUS = #{interviewStatus} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_candidate_push set PUSH_STATUS = #{pushStatus} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and PUSH_USER_ID = #{pushUserId};
update t_candidate set CANDIDATE_STATUS = #{candidateStatus},LOCK_PERSION='' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_candidate set CANDIDATE_STATUS ='2' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,d.STATUS as demandStatus FROM t_candidate a LEFT JOIN (select * from (select CANDIDATE_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_ID from t_candidate_push a where PUSH_DATE = (select max(PUSH_DATE) from t_candidate_push b where a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID ) )a group by CANDIDATE_ID )b ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept c ON b.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = c.CS_SUBDEPT_ID INNER JOIN t_demand d ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = d.CANDIDATE_ID WHERE LOCK_PERSION = if(#{lockPerson}='all',a.LOCK_PERSION,#{lockPerson}) and a.LOCK_PERSION is not null and a.LOCK_PERSION != '' and CANDIDATE_STATUS in (1,2) and d.STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay','Onboard','Offering') AND d.STATUS != 'Onboard'
ORDER BY d.STATUS,CANDIDATE_STATUS,INTERVIEW_STATUS,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate a INNER JOIN t_demand d ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = d.CANDIDATE_ID WHERE LOCK_PERSION = if(#{lockPerson}='all',a.LOCK_PERSION,#{lockPerson}) and a.LOCK_PERSION is not null and a.LOCK_PERSION != '' and CANDIDATE_STATUS in (1,2) and d.STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay','Onboard','Offering') AND d.STATUS != 'Onboard'
;
mapper.update: update t_candidate set REAL_SALARY = #{realSalary},ARRIVAL_DATE = #{arrivalDate} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_candidate set ARRIVAL_DATE = #{arrivalDate} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_demand set STATUS = 'Delay' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade');
update t_candidate set CANDIDATE_STATUS = #{candidateStatus},REMARK = #{remark} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_demand set STATUS = 'Abort' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay');
mapper.select: select * from t_demand where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay');

SELECT a.NICKNAME,ci.FEEDBACK,ci.FATHER_INTERVIEW_ID,ci.INTERVIEW_SERIAL, ci.INTERVIEW_DATE,dept.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,ci.INTERVIEW_STATUS,ci.PROJECT_NAME,ci.INTERVIEW_TYPE FROM t_user a JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_candidate b on ci.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept dept on dept.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = ci.CSSUBDEPT WHERE b.CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} ORDER BY ci.INTERVIEW_DATE;
mapper.update: update t_candidate set INTERVIEW_STATUS = #{interviewStatus},CANDIDATE_STATUS = '1' where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId}
update t_candidate set INTERVIEW_STATUS = #{interviewStatus},CANDIDATE_STATUS = '1' where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId}
update t_candidate set CANDIDATE_STATUS = '0',LOCK_PERSION = #{userId} where CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId}
update t_demand set STATUS = 'OfferMade' , BGV_CLEARED = 'Initiated' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and STATUS in ('Offering','offering');
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM t_candidate WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS between '4' and '6'
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,EXPERIENCE_YEARS desc,EDUCATION,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS between '4' and '6'
;
